divs: sighting detailswhile lying in a pickup bed with my two year old son we both witnessed two u.f.o.s. they were above the mountain in front of my house about 1\4 mile away. the two objects hovered for at least a minute next to each other then they flew off to the right\south extremely fast leaving the skyline in a second or less. my two year old son and i both witnessed the objects are were both very excited to have seen them. we have only told my parents who were also present but were inside the pickup truck and did not see the objects.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Coarsegold
There were no other sightings in Coarsegold on or around July 2nd 2010
Summary: Shimmering silver cigar shape with orange/brown band in the middle.
